sub_title: Technology & Business Consultant, Instructor, Group CEO
summary:
CyberSecurity Consultant, Manager, Instructor, Mentor, Business Owner. 

I help organizations across the globe to overcome their business and technology challenges.   

My specialties as a CyberSecurity consultant (10+ years): 
Architecture and Policy, Data Loss Prevention, Governance, Risk and Compliance, Identity and Access Management, Incident Response and Forensic Analysis, Penetration Testing, DevSecOps, Secure Software Development.
 
My specialties as a business owner, director, leader, executive and manager (5+ years):
General Management, Strategy Development, Project Management, Budget Management, Supplier Management, People Management (Local, Remote, Virtual teams), Global Business Development, Consulting, Operations Management

Degree/Qualifications/Awards:
MSc, CISM, CISA, CEH, CDPSE, OCE, OCP, CCNA, CCNP, MCP, CCSA
Gold Member of ISACA (isaca.org)
TeamWork Award
Math and Logics Contest Award
Future Leaders Contest Award
Real Aikido Martial art Yellow Belt Award

To discuss cooperation opportunities, send me a message or call me at +1 415-655-1030. Talk to you soon ;)
